features: MOISTURIZING HAND SOAP nourishes your skin with a rich, creamy foaming lather that naturally cleanses and softens your skin. Enriched with Shea Butter to lock in hydration, our soothing hand wash is formulated for all skin types.

FRESH, NATURAL SCENT of vanilla and lily is warm, luxurious and comforting aroma. Natural moisturizing emollient benefits give your skin a surge of deep hydration. Rich in Vitamin B for a nourished, refreshed feeling.
VEGAN HAND SOAP is cruelty and gluten free. Rich foaming hand soap contains no harsh chemicals and parabens. Made in the USA.

PREMIUM LIQUID HAND SOAP is a perfect gift choice for yourself or a loved one, to add a touch of luxury to the daily routine. Set of three Hand Soap pump bottles, 12 Ounces per bottle. Enriched with Shea Butter and Aloe Vera buffs away dirt while locking-in moisture - creates a thick, rich lather and rinses completely for a fresh, clean feeling

FEEL THE DIFFERENCE, MAKE A DIFFERENCE through everyday, quality purchases - your purchase of this 3-pack of bathroom hand soap also donates 3 bars of soap to someone in need, supporting our mission of soap=hope. Track your impact by entering your Hope Code found on the back of your soap.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HELLO HYDRATION A Dose of Invigorating Moisture Bring a spa-like aroma to your kitchen and bathroom with the invigorating scents available in our liquid hand soaps and refill packs. Washing your hands shouldn’t strip them dry; we created our hand soap to replenish your skin. Made with Shea Butter and Aloe Vera, each special formulation has an invigorating scent, gentle cleanser and nourishing ingredients.

FIND YOUR FAVORITE Spa-like scents in every bottle From the bright, crisp scent of Meyer lemon to the creamy, tropical fragrance of Coconut Milk and everything in between, we have a variety of awakening bouquets that refresh without overpowering. Each is combined with our aloe and shea butter blend to provide an intense burst of nourishing hydration with each wash. Coconut and Sandalwood, Meyer Lemon and Tea Leaves, Sea Minerals and Blue Iris and Vanilla and Lily Blossom, and more! Find the perfect fit for every sink in the house.

Explore our scents Meyer Lemon & Tea Leaves Add to Cart Coconut Milk & Sandalwood Add to Cart Sea Minerals & Blue Iris Add to Cart Citrus & Peach Rose Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.5 out of 5 stars 449 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,959 4.6 out of 5 stars 551 4.7 out of 5 stars 507 Price $17.99$17.99 $14.97$14.97 $14.97$14.97 $14.97$14.97 Formulated for all skin types ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Gentle enough for daily use ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ With hydrating shea butter ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Vegan and cruelty free ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Free of harsh chemicals ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Paraben free ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I buy this product for the smell and the moisturizing properties of the soap. It does not disappoint! We keep one in the kitchen and each bathroom and love this soapbox vanilla and lily smell. Clean and nice, not too flowery, just lovely!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS HANDSOAP! SO SOFT ON HANDS!
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin, and so does my husband. The hand soaps from SoapBox are just wonderful. It does not irritate my hands or dry them out like so many soaps do. Almost feels like you're putting on lotion, lol. The few different scents I've tried all have smelled quite nice. This one smells lovely. My husband and I both like this scent too.I first found the website for SoapBox on Grove .com buying a coconut hair conditioner of theirs, and feel in love with it. I've since also begun using both their coconut bar shampoo and bar conditioner, and really love that too. It was then I found their hand soaps.The company makes amazing more natural, clean products. But they also are dedicated to donating soaps for people in need all around the world, one for each item sold. I think that's awesome, and I like helping to support that as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent!
reviews.reviewText: This hand soap not only does the job, but it has turned my whole bathroom into a slice of aromatic heaven. The Vanilla and Lily Blossom scent has strong vanilla notes with some floral undertones, and just a hint of a woodsy cedar scent. It is just wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff smells divine!
reviews.reviewText: This soap smells amazing and the scent lasts quite awhile. I feel like it cleans well. This scent is fairly feminine though so might not be the best for "manly" men; but I love it and this is going to be my go-to soap in my bathrooms and kitchen from here on out. I did find that one of the bottles was impossible to open which other reviewers have said was an issue; I will have to use another bottle pump in the one I can't get open. Not a deal breaker, but slightly annoying as this isn't the cheapest soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great. Easy on hands!
reviews.reviewText: Will buy again. Love the smell and feel on my hands!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Devine scent, too harsh for my sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent, but for me, it actually has too much fragrance, and irritated my sensitive skin. I washed my hands with it, and was excited because it doesn't smell like most other soaps. It has a creamy, musky scent. The vanilla is in the background, and the musk is on top. The consistency and look is similar to some Softsoap handsoaps. Thick, slimy, pearlescent. It's not a transparent gel looking soap. I rinsed my hands and realized that the scent was still heavily left behind. My palms began to hurt, and itch immediately. It stripped what little moisture I had on my hands. Keep in mind, I have very dry, sensitive skin, so this likely won't be the case for everyone. I'm deducting a star not because of how it made my skin feel, but because I think the scent left behind was far too much. I washed my hands three times with my regular hand soap, and could still smell this soap on my hands. I actually love fragrance, and wouldn't mind smelling like this, but yeah, just too much for my skin to tolerate, sadly. I wish this scent were available in some sort of other product. Perfume/body spray, room spray, etc. because I really do love how it smells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my hands smell good and feel good.
reviews.reviewText: Makes my hands smell good and feel good.
